mapper.select: SELECT reviewSeq, userId, starCnt, reply, inDate, modDate, inUserId, upUserId FROM( SELECT REVIEW_SEQ AS reviewSeq, USER_ID AS userId, STAR_CNT AS starCnt, REPLY AS reply, IN_DATE AS inDate, UP_DATE AS modDate, IN_USER_ID AS inUserId, UP_USER_ID AS upUserId, row_number()over(order by USER_ID desc) AS rNum FROM REVIEW ) rv WHERE userId = '${id}' and rNum BETWEEN 1 and 10
